posts.content:
enough said!
Dentist x-ray can't "see" anything so prescribes antibiotics in case of infection.
For 3 days now it feels like I've been punched in the jaw.
I hate toothache! 24 hour unavoidable grief.
Nothing to eat but bananas and soup either!
Rant over.....
DD

I used to have toothache a lot over the years and even resorted to diy dentistry at one point. I used to get the Anadin liquid capsules which you're supposed to swallow and bite them over the tooth that hurt. It burnt a bit and tasted nasty but the pain went instantly

Then I married a dental nurse and got in an NHS dentist true story

I had the abscess from hell under the 5 lower front teeth after a failed root canal, my new dentist cut under the gum line, ground out the roots, cleaned the infectected area and stitched up the gum, thats ten years ago and its been pain free:-) Nhs superb dentist, even though he acts and looks like Steve Martin out of little shop of horrors.
Now i feel bad for only having one filling, i only got that for my fortieth! always get strange presents.
